GREAT_CIRCLE_LAYER_DATA = airport  # noqa

# Define a layer to display on a map
layer = pdk.Layer(
    "GreatCircleLayer",
    airport,
    pickable=True,
    get_stroke_width=22,
    get_source_position=['Org_airport_long','Org_airport_lat'],
    get_target_position=['Dest_airport_long','Dest_airport_lat'],
    get_source_color=[64, 255, 0],
    get_target_color=[0, 128, 200],
    auto_highlight=True,
)

# Set the viewport location
view_state = pdk.ViewState(latitude=airport['Org_airport_lat'].mean(), longitude=airport['Org_airport_long'].mean(), zoom=3, bearing=0, pitch=0)

# Render
r = pdk.Deck(layers=[layer], initial_view_state=view_state, tooltip={"text": "{Origin_city} to {Destination_city}"},)
r.picking_radius = 10

r.to_html("great_circle_layer.html")
